args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Failure to Detect a Loss of Brake Assist/FMVSS 105

Blue Bird Bus Company (Blue Bird) is recalling certain 2022-2024 Vision electric school buses equipped with hydraulic brakes.  The system software may fail to detect and alert the driver to a loss of the secondary brake assist.Driving the bus without a functioning secondary brake assist increases the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 163.0
